string-array.name: sad_messages
string-array.item: You\'re not alone in this. It\'s okay to feel down sometimes.
Take a deep breath. This feeling will pass.
You\'re stronger than you think. One step at a time.
It\'s okay to not be okay. Be gentle with yourself today.
Your feelings are valid. Tomorrow is a new day.

string-array.name: angry_messages
string-array.item: Take a moment to breathe. You\'ve got this.
It\'s okay to feel angry. What matters is how you respond.
Step back, breathe deeply, and choose your next move wisely.
Your calm is your superpower. Find it again.
This feeling is temporary. You control your response.

string-array.name: anxious_messages
string-array.item: You\'re safe right now. Focus on your breath.
This feeling will pass. You\'ve overcome anxiety before.
Ground yourself: 5 things you see, 4 you feel, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste.
You\'re stronger than your anxiety. Take it one breath at a time.
It\'s just a feeling. It can\'t hurt you. You\'re in control.

string-array.name: neutral_messages
string-array.item: Remember to be kind to yourself today.
You\'re doing your best, and that\'s enough.
Take a moment to appreciate something small around you.
